answers.answer: Do you have diabetes?  I would get checked for gastroparesis, which is often a problem in diabetics.  Another possibility is gallbladder disease.You might try a good probiotic and digestive enzymes to see if that helps.  Go to a good health food store for advice on brands as I can't give out brand names here.
